name: ALEXANDRA MARTIN
summary: Ambitious and detail-oriented business graduate with a strong interest in finance and international business. Proven track record in managing financial analysis projects and collaborating with cross-functional teams. Seeking to further develop skills and contribute to the dynamic environment at Paris Business School.

work_experience.title: Financial Analyst Intern
description: Conducted financial analysis and prepared reports for investment strategies, contributing to a 15% increase in client portfolio performance
Collaborated with senior analysts to evaluate market trends and economic indicators
Prepared presentations for client meetings and internal stakeholders

work_experience.title: Operations Intern
description: Assisted in streamlining operations processes, reducing processing time by 10%
Supported the client services team in handling inquiries and resolving issues
Maintained and updated operational reports for management review
